tweets.text: It is the worst policy so far, it is a fraud.
Only patanjali profits from this, government wrecking our economy.
I am sure that this movement is going to enriche our green cover and improve the sanitary conditions.
What a shady move by government, diverting our focus from core problems like corruption and leeching to simple things like keeping roads clean
Such a bold move by our honerable Prime Minister.
The blunder made by the goverment due to applying demonitisation thoughtlessly has caused a serious blow to our GDP. Shame
